DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this randomized clinical trial was to compare caries prevention of a conventional resin-based sealant and a glass-ionomer sealant placed on occlusal pits and fissures over a one year period in a high caries children group. Additionally the concentration of Fluoride in saliva was evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial of Caries Prevention Effect of Fissure Sealants
DOC.criteria: 1.Age range of 6 to 10 years 2.Having caries free, fully erupted first permanent molars 3.Deep and/or intermediate pits or fissures 4.dft â‰¥ 2 1.Having any systemic disease 2.Topical fluoride was applied last six months 3.dft = 0
